nodes.name: EINOwnable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The SnowflakeEINOwnable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: _constructEINOwnable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyEINOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if address resolves to owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isEINOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership
EINOwnable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The SnowflakeEINOwnable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: _constructEINOwnable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyEINOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if address resolves to owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isEINOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

devdoc.details: The EINOwnable contract has an owner EIN, and provides basic authorization control functions, this simplifies the implementation of "user permissions".

isEINOwner().return: true if address resolves to owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(uint256).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: EINOwnable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
